variables.label: NGINX Unit Version
variables.description: Check out their Docker page for the valid tags https://hub.docker.com/r/nginx/unit/tags

instructions.start: Deploying NGINX Unit dynamic application server.
instructions.end: NGINX Unit has been deployed! Access the control API at http://$$cap_appname.$$cap_root_domain. Configure your applications via the REST API.

description: Dynamic web application server. Run apps in multiple languages with on-the-fly configuration without service disruption.
